posts.post_title: FS: Pair of High Grade T-205s
posts.post_content:

Street (SGC 70) - SOLD

Street (Raw, American Beauty Green Back) - SOLD

Buy both for the discounted price of $SOLD.  All prices include shipping and handling.  Scans are bellow:
